description: Types of things. All things of the same type have a similar set of characteristics.
name: Types

addedBy.description: The user who added a thing to a library.
addedBy.name: Added by
addedBy.shortDescription: The user who added a thing.

addedOn.description: The date and time when a thing was added to a library.
addedOn.name: Added on

archived.name: Archived
archived.shortDescription: Has a thing been archived (marked as irrelevant or obsolete)?

canRead.description: The users and groups of users allowed to read a thing's properties.
canRead.name: Can read
canRead.shortDescription: Who can view a thing's properties?

canWrite.description: The user and groups of users allowed to change a thing's properties.
canWrite.name: Can write
canWrite.shortDescription: Who can change a thing's properties?

controller.description: The user who controls who can access a thing.
controller.name: Controller

description.description: Text that describes a thing in detail.
description.name: Description

extends.description: The type that this type of thing is a sub-type of.
extends.name: Extends
extends.shortDescription: The type of thing that this type of thing extends.

isNamePlural.description: Is the name of a thing pluralized (like these notes, instead of this notes)?
isNamePlural.name: Is name plural
isNamePlural.shortDescription: Is the name of a thing a plural noun?

name.description: A thing's name. Text that identifies and labels a thing.
name.name: Name

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified this thing.
modifiedBy.name: Modified by
modifiedBy.shortDescription: The user who last changed this thing.

modifiedOn.description: The last time this thing was edited.
modifiedOn.name: Modified on
modifiedOn.shortDescription: Time when this thing was last changed.

path.description: The names of all the things on the path to this thing.
path.name: Path

properties.description: The properties that things of this type may have.
properties.name: Properties
properties.shortDescription: Properties that things of the same type have.

shortDescription.description: Text that describes a thing in less than 80 characters.
shortDescription.name: Short description
shortDescription.shortDescription: Text that briefly describes a thing.

singularName.description: Text that describes the type for a single instance of this type of thing.
singularName.name: Singular name
singularName.shortDescription: Name for one of these types of things.
